Album: 百代百年系列15:我要你的爱
Lyric:
[by:悟空你又顽皮了]

[00:11.23][00:26.96][01:14.64][01:29.70]我 我要 我要你 我要你的
[00:21.90][01:24.47]我要你的爱 你为什么不走过来
[00:37.29][01:40.17]我要你的爱 你为什么不说出来
[00:42.48]Listen to your mama and you never will regret it
[00:45.02]and if anybody wonders you can tell them that I said it the
[00:47.68]only thing I know is that I never can forget you I've
[00:50.22]been longing for you baby ever since the day
[00:52.40]I met you I got you where I want you and I'm never gonna let you
[00:56.04]get away from me
[00:56.92]hear what I tell you
[00:58.34][02:02.12]I'm the man for you and so you better start to face it
[01:00.94][02:04.23]If you ever loose my love you know you never can replace it
[01:03.40]I think it's time for you to start to give me some loving carrying
[01:06.39]a touch for you that's hotter than an oven It's time for you and me
[01:09.66]to do a little tender loving baby
[01:11.53][02:14.97]hold me tight and do what I tell you
[01:45.65]
[02:00.74]我爱你我爱你
[02:06.96]I think it's time for you to start to give me some loving
[02:09.56]carrying a touch for you that's hotter than an oven
[02:12.24]It's time for you and me a little tender baby
[02:17.72]我 我要 我要你 我要你说
[02:28.30]只要说声爱
[02:30.54]你为什么不 为什么不 为什么不肯说
